name: cash-dom
description: An absurdly small jQuery alternative for modern browsers.

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.test:jquery:init: ( git -C ./test/jquery reset --hard HEAD && git -C ./test/jquery pull ) || git clone https://github.com/jquery/jquery.git ./test/jquery
scripts.test:jquery: npm run test:jquery:init && npm run test:jquery:build && cd ./test/jquery && npm i && opn http://localhost:4444/test/index.html\?module=css && php -S localhost:4444
scripts.test:jquery:build:watch: while sleep 1; do npm run test:jquery:build; done
scripts.test:jquery:reverse: npm run test:jquery:init && npm run test:jquery:reverse:build && npm run test:watch
scripts.test:jquery:reverse:build:watch: while sleep 1; do npm run test:jquery:reverse:build; done
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test:playwright
